posts.title: THT and Jonathan Isaac to Lakers
posts.description: Los Angeles Lakers trade for Jonathan Isaac and Talen Horton-Tucker into an agreement to exchange Gbae Vincent, Rui Hachimura and a 2024 1st-Round Pick

posts.title: Timberwolves trade for Tobias Harris
posts.description: 76ers and Timberwolves enter into an agreement to exchange Rudy Gobert for Tobias Harris

posts.title: Damian Lillard goes to Bucks
posts.description: Damian Lillard is finally traded to the Bucks in a 3-teams trade

posts.title: Chicago Bulls trade for Austin Reaves
posts.description: Los Angeles Lakers get Mitchell Robinson plus two 2024 1st-round picks

posts.title: DeRozan and Vucevic to Knicks
posts.description: The Knicks are sending R.J. Barret, M. Robinson, Fournier and three 1st-round picks to the Bulls as part of the trade

posts.title: Zach LaVine is a Maverick
posts.description: Dallas send 5 players and 2027 1st round pick to Chicago Bulls for LaVine
